alert.note: Alert for Barren; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Metcalfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 7:59AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN LARUE...HART... SOUTHEASTERN GRAYSON...SOUTH CENTRAL HARDIN...NORTHEASTERN BARREN AND NORTHWESTERN METCALFE COUNTIES THROUGH 830 AM EDT/730 AM CDT/... At 758 AM EDT/658 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Leitchfield to 10 miles northwest of Glasgow. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Hodgenville, Munfordville, Monroe, Horse Cave, Cave City, Upton, Park City, Sonora, Bonnieville and Boundary Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville.

area.areaDesc: Barren; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Metcalfe
